problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, DC ∥ AB, BC = N_0, AB = AC = AD = N_1, then the length of BD is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,延长BA交⊙A于F,连接DF．∵BF是直径,∴∠BDF=90°,∵CD∥BF,∴∠CDB=∠DBF,∴⁀{DF}=⁀{BC},∴DF=BC=2,∵BF=2AB=6,∴BD=√{BF^{2}-DF^{2}}=√{6^{2}-2^{2}}=4√{2},故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查圆周角定理,勾股定理,平行线的性质等知识,解题的关键是熟练掌握基本知识,属于中考常考题型．
